name: Getequity Mobile Login Screen Redesign
description: The redesign has three main changes: 1) the alignment between "forgot password"and login input field was adjusted to make it easy for users to reset password 2) the input color's lightness was increased to improve some contrast issues and make it appear more inviting to input data, and 3) a create account button was added as part of the login screen to allow users easier access to creating an account.
